verses.verse: Let him <S%H5401>kiss<s%> me with the <S%H4480>kisses<s%> <S%H5390><s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thy <S%H1730>love<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H4480>wine.<s%> <S%H3196><s%>

Because of the <S%H7381>savor<s%> of thy <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8081>ointments<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> is as <S%H8081>ointment<s%> poured <S%H7324>forth,<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> do the <S%H5959>virgins<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> thee.

Draw <S%H4900><s%> me, we will <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee: the <S%H4428>king<s%> hath <S%H935>brought<s%> me into his <S%H2315>chambers:<s%> we will be <S%H1523>glad<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in thee, we will <S%H2142>remember<s%> thy <S%H1730>love<s%> more than <S%H4480>wine:<s%> <S%H3196><s%> the <S%H4339>upright<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> thee.

I <S%H589><s%> am <S%H7838>black,<s%> but <S%H5000>comely,<s%> O ye <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> as the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> as the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

Look <S%H7200><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> upon me, because <S%H7945>I<s%> <S%H589><s%> am <S%H7840>black,<s%> because the <S%H8121>sun<s%> hath <S%H7945>looked<s%> <S%H7805><s%> upon me: my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> were <S%H2734>angry<s%> with me; they <S%H7760>made<s%> me the <S%H5201>keeper<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyards;<s%> but mine <S%H7945>own<s%> <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> have I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5201>kept.<s%>

Tell <S%H5046><s%> me, O thou whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7945>loveth,<s%> <S%H157><s%> <S%H349>where<s%> thou <S%H7462>feedest,<s%> <S%H349>where<s%> thou makest thyflock to <S%H7257>rest<s%> at <S%H6672>noon:<s%> for <S%H7945>why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> should I <S%H1961>be<s%> as one that turneth <S%H5844>aside<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of thy <S%H2270>companions?<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> O thou <S%H3303>fairest<s%> among <S%H802>women,<s%> go thy way <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the <S%H6119>footsteps<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1429>kids<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherds'<s%> <S%H4908>tents.<s%>
I have <S%H1819>compared<s%> thee, O my <S%H7474>love,<s%> to a company of <S%H5484>horses<s%> in <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H7393>chariots.<s%>
Thy <S%H3895>cheeks<s%> are <S%H4998>comely<s%> with <S%H8447>rows<s%> of jewels, thy <S%H6677>neck<s%> with <S%H2737>chains<s%> of gold.
While <S%H5704><s%> the <S%H7945>king<s%> <S%H4428><s%> sitteth at his <S%H4524>table,<s%> my <S%H5373>spikenard<s%> sendeth <S%H5414>forth<s%> the <S%H7381>smell<s%> thereof.
A <S%H6872>bundle<s%> of <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> is my <S%H1730>well-beloved<s%> unto me; he shall lie all <S%H3885>night<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> my <S%H7699>breasts.<s%>
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is unto me as a <S%H811>cluster<s%> of <S%H3724>camphire<s%> in the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> of <S%H5872>En-gedi.<s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> thou art <S%H3303>fair,<s%> my <S%H7474>love;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> thou art <S%H3303>fair;<s%> thou hast <S%H3123>doves'<s%> <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> thou art <S%H3303>fair,<s%> my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> <S%H637>yea,<s%> <S%H5273>pleasant:<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> our <S%H6210>bed<s%> is <S%H7488>green.<s%>
The <S%H6982>beams<s%> of our <S%H1004>house<s%> are <S%H730>cedar,<s%> and our <S%H7351>rafters<s%> of <S%H1266>fir.<s%>
